message:
Maybe I'm doing something wrong.

 I am the admin for the group. I want to add someone else. I click on Group Actions - members - make admin - and nothing happens.

Is that the way you do it?
@miikao  Thanks - but it still doesn't work! Oh well it is not exactly a huge problem.

@lindfields2 can you send an email to convore@convore.com with the name of the group and the username of the person you want to make an admin? I'm on the Convore team and would like to fix this for you!
